CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(ucinn_ascendv2__Prefix__c) = "", "", TEXT(ucinn_ascendv2__Prefix__c) + " ") + IF(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__First_Name__c), "", ucinn_ascendv2__First_Name__c + " ") + IF(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Middle_Name__c), "", ucinn_ascendv2__Middle_Name__c + " ") + IF(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Last_Name__c), "", ucinn_ascendv2__Last_Name__c + " ") + TEXT(ucinn_ascendv2__Suffix__c)
CustomField.label: Constructed Name
